tool_description: Convert Postal Code to information like region, estate, street name, etc.
name: SG Postal Code Information
title: SG Postal Code Information

api_list.name: Postal Code to Full Address
api_list.description: Input a valid SG postal code to retrieve full address information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sg-postal-code-information.p.rapidapi.com/postal"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sg-postal-code-information.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sg-postal-code-information.p.rapidapi.com/postal"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sg-postal-code-information.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
